column4: is there a graphical tool to configure my network card in ubuntu ?

wired or wireless?
then the networking thing will do it..
in the terminal type: sudo mii-diag eth0
cyphase : you can look at this : http://nico.aunai.free.fr/tmp/RES.TXT
you have no IP address, have you enabled DHCP or set a static address?

yes...

and have you hit the activate button too?
: it is telling me that eth0 is active
and the properties tell you it's configured and has the right IP address?

there's something wrong with the physical connection

; what do you mean the "physical connection" ?
if you have multiple network cards (like an onboard one and a real card or two real cards) check whether it's conencted to the right socket

the cable is broken or not connected well...

then check it on the other pc and make sure you have a crossover cable...
